18 The broad-spectrum and established use of plant-based medicines to combat infectious diseases in TCM is the basis of several currently ongoing clinical trials in China. One of the largest among them assesses shuanghuanglian, a Chinese herbal medicine that contains extracts from the dried fruit lianqiao ( Forsythiae fructus), which is purported to have been used for treating infections for more than 2,000 years.
